description: Exec command inside of a container or environment
help: Exec command inside of a container or environment. Exec bash if no command is given
options: $command*    Command to be executed (bash if no command is given)
u|user:      Specify the user to run the command
p|plugin:    Run using the specific exec plugin (console command .exec-<plugin>)
t|terminal|T|no-terminal~{0,1}[terminal=@]  [t|terminal]Set interactive terminal mode [T|no-terminal]Set non-interactive pipe mode
